description:
Deepgram has unveiled Nova-3 Medical, an AI speech-to-text (STT) model tailored for transcription in the demanding environment of healthcare. Designed to integrate seamlessly with existing clinical workflows, Nova-3 Medical aims to address the growing need for accurate and efficient transcription in the UK’s public NHS and private healthcare landscape. As electronic health records (EHRs), telemedicine, […]

The post Deepgram Nova-3 Medical: AI speech model cuts healthcare transcription errors appeared first on AI News.
title: Deepgram Nova-3 Medical: AI speech model cuts healthcare transcription errors
